Package imagingbook.lib.filters

Class LinearFilter2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.filters.GenericFilter2D
      • imagingbook.lib.filters.LinearFilter2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GaussianFilter
    public class LinearFilter2D
extends GenericFilter2D
    Generic linear convolution filter implemented by extending the GenericFilter2D class. If applied to a vector-valued image (e.g. an RGB image) this scalar filter is applied to each component, which is automatically handled by GenericFilter2D. Thus only the scalar version of the filter needs to be defined (see filterScalar(ScalarAccessor, int, int)).
    Version:
    2020/12/29

    • Method Detail

      • filterScalar

        protected float filterScalar​(ScalarAccessor ia,
                             int u,
                             int v)
        Description copied from class: GenericFilter2D
        Calculates and returns the filter result for a single pixel at the given position in a scalar-valued image. Concrete filters must implement at least this method.
        Specified by:
        filterScalar in class GenericFilter2D
        Parameters:
        ia - the ScalarAccessor representing the source (scalar-valued) image
        u - the horizontal pixel position
        v - the vertical pixel position
        Returns:
        the resulting (scalar) pixel value for the specified image position

      • getKernel

        public float[][] getKernel()
        Returns the kernel of this filter as a 2D float array. Provided for sub-classes who create their own kernel (e.g., GaussianFilter).
        Returns:
        the filter kernel (no copy)
